projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.omnicalc.desc: A multifunctional calculator built with Jetpack Compose. Features include: complex expressions, variables, formula storage, downloadable packages, unit converter, and UI customization
projects.java3d.desc: A first-person game written in Java using Swing. Renders 3D graphics on CPU only, without external rendering libraries
projects.gigachat.desc: Integrated GigaChat into ELMA365 for automated document analysis
projects.airsoft.desc: A PyQt5 application designed to streamline the organization of airsoft games. Includes player and organizer profiles, team creation and game management
projects.desktop.desc: A lightweight Kotlin desktop app using Swing and Ollama to run a local LLM. Designed as a simple and convenient personal AI tool
